_source.short_desc: PowerChurch Plus is an all-in-one software that helps keep track of Membership, Contributions, Accounting, Events Calendar and more!
_source.long_desc:
PowerChurch Plus is an all-in-one software solution that helps keep track of Membership, Contributions, Accounting, Events Calendar and more!

Since 1984, PowerChurch Software has been serving churches and nonprofits by providing affordable and easy to use software that helps streamline your day-to-day tasks as a busy church administrator. With PowerChurch, you will find straightforward pricing and no high-pressure sales tactics.
_source.target_audience: PowerChurch Plus targets growing churches looking for membership, ministry management, and church accounting.

category_features.name: Accounting Integration
category_features.definition: Integrate with a third party accounting system

category_features.name: Attendance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track specific people who attended events or the total number of attendees

category_features.name: Built-in Accounting
category_features.definition: Accounting functionality within the system, not requiring 3rd party assistance

category_features.name: Child Check-in
category_features.definition: Secure process of tracking children during activities

category_features.name: Donation Management
category_features.definition: Track/record financial donations made by members, along with the issuance of tax receipts/documents

category_features.name: Event Management
category_features.definition: Schedule and manage the logistics of activities and other gatherings

category_features.name: For Religious Organizations
category_features.definition: Primarily serving churches and religious organizations

category_features.name: Member Communication
category_features.definition: Manage the methods of communicating/engagement (ie. mail, email, SMS, phone calls)

category_features.name: Member Directory
category_features.definition: Online or printable list/directory of members (for external use)

category_features.name: Member Portal
category_features.definition: Online gateway through which members can access/update personal information

category_features.name: Membership Management
category_features.definition: Database of members to track personal information of individuals and families

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Multi-Location
category_features.definition: Organize the operations at multiple locations

category_features.name: Online Calendar
category_features.definition: Online calendar of upcoming events/activities viewable to members and visitors

category_features.name: Online Giving
category_features.definition: Outlet for members and visitors to submit donations electronically

category_features.name: Pledge Management
category_features.definition: Track commitments to donate in the future

category_features.name: Small Group Management
category_features.definition: Organize members and schedule recurring small group meetings

category_features.name: Volunteer Management
category_features.definition: Manage volunteer information and direct volunteer resources

category_features.name: Website Management
category_features.definition: Website builder or integration with 3rd party site

category_features.name: Worship Planning
category_features.definition: Coordinate and schedule the flow of services, plan musical selections, and assign team members

category_features.name: Accounts Payable
category_features.definition: Track money owed to a company's creditors/suppliers

category_features.name: Accounts Receivable
category_features.definition: Track outstanding invoices and the money owed from clients

category_features.name: Asset Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor assets (i.e. equipment, tools, software, hardware, etc.) lifecycle and usage from acquisition to retirement

category_features.name: Bank Reconciliation
category_features.definition: Compare and match accounting/financial records with corresponding bank statements

category_features.name: Budgeting/Forecasting
category_features.definition: Track actual spending to ensure it's in line with the budget and estimate future finances

category_features.name: Donation Management
category_features.definition: Track/record financial donations made by members, along with the issuance of tax receipts/documents

category_features.name: Fund Accounting
category_features.definition: Manage revenue acquired through grants, donations, and other sources (accountability vs. profitability)

category_features.name: Payroll Management
category_features.definition: Track and process employee payroll (salaries, wages, etc.)

related_products.short_desc: Industry-leading live event presentation and live streaming tool built for Mac and Windows. Download the free demo today!
related_products.features: ProPresenter is the leading live production presentation and streaming tool for organizations of all sizes. Features include rock-solid stability, volunteer-friendly ease of use, and the ability to display lyrics, video playback, chord charts, and more on one or even multiple screens. Built for Mac & Windows, ProPresenter is used by NASA, The Olympics, the Office of the President, hundreds of school districts, and hundreds of thousands of churches. Download our free demo today!

related_products.short_desc: Church management solution that offers processing donations, managing memberships, planning services, scheduling volunteers, and more.
related_products.features: Planning Center is a set of seven online software products designed to help you find freedom to focus on what matters in your ministry. You can subscribe to individual products, or use them all together as a full church management system. We have tools to help you manage your membership database, schedule volunteers, plan services, check people in, take signups, process online donations, manage your calendar and facilities, and coordinate small groups. Every plan includes full access to support.

related_products.short_desc: #1 Marketing Platform For SMB's! Create a Free Account
related_products.features: Get everything you need to manage and grow your business,  all from a singular platform  create your free account today to explore the platform and compare plans and pricing.

related_products.short_desc: User-friendly, powerful church management software with Membership, Scheduler, Donations, Accounting, and Payroll. Desktop and Web!
related_products.features: Church Windows is powerful and flexible yet user-friendly church management software from a well-established leader in the industry. Choose complete integrated packages of Membership, Scheduler, Donations, Accounting and Payroll modules, or begin with one portion and add additional modules later. In addition to the experienced toll-free & online support, we offer free online training classes. Find out why more than 13,000 churches since 1987 see things clearly through Church Windows Software.

related_products.short_desc: Complete church management system. See why so many churches are making the switch (nearly 10,000 in just the last two years)!
related_products.features: We exist to help churches thrive! Powerful, easy to use church management for attendance, contributions, groups, pledging, donor statements, mass email/text, child check-in, mail merge, sacraments, dashboards, robust custom reporting and much more! PC/MAC/iOS/Android. Over 35K churches and 150K ministry leaders moved to Servant Keeper 8(nearly 10,000 churches in just the last two years)! Find out why they are making the switch!

related_products.short_desc: Track donors, donations and pledges for your church.  Accept online donations (integrated with most online giving providers).
related_products.features: Easily keep track of members, contributions, pledges and more... Starts at $47.98 (one-time cost, no monthly fees; no attendance tracking, accounting or payroll) Receive donations using online giving (Donarius is integrated with most providers). Print or email yearly tax receipts and quarterly statements.  Prints church photo directories.  Share data from any computer like web-based software, but without the monthly fee, using DropBox or Google Drive.  Exports data to QuickBooks.  PC or Mac.

related_products.short_desc: At ChurchTrac, our all-in-one software has all the tools you need built-in, so you can simplify your ministry and save money.
related_products.features:
Most church leaders are DROWNING in a sea of apps to run their ministry. (7 is the average)

They're using applications for things like online giving, mass texting, scheduling, member directories, and more. This gets confusing and expensive!

At ChurchTrac, our all-in-one software has all the tools you need built-in, so you can simplify your ministry and save money.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 #1 free church management software. Cloud, mobile, open source.
related_products.features: If you are looking for free online church management software, you'll love Bitrix24. Free for unlimited users, Bitrix24 is a tool of choice by many faith-based and non-profit organizations who have limited funds. More importantly, Bitrix24 has both social tools for engaging your congregation, like social network, user groups, polling, media gallery, shared calendars, video conferencing and business tools like CRM, telephony or project management that help you keep your affair in order.

related_products.short_desc: Easily manage contributions, create a website, accept online donations, create reports, send out emails, plan events and more.
related_products.features: WildApricot is a complete membership management system, designed to fit the needs of your church. Easily manage contributions, create a website, accept online donations, create reports, send out emails, plan events and more. With a self serve design and a user friendly interface, you can customize every aspect of your church management system. If you need help at any step of the way, our support team and community of experts are ready to help guide you and share their best practices.

related_products.short_desc: Engage donors, plan events, manage members, track volunteers, and more with the best all-in-one software for faith-based organizations.
related_products.features: Neon CRM is a cloud-based nonprofit software suite that provides tools built to support the good work faith-based organizations do. Regardless of size or industry, our CRM helps thousands of organizations and associations engage with donors, manage memberships, plan events, track volunteers, and much more -- your whole operation out of one single, unified software.

related_products.short_desc: Mobilize your church with software that blends best ministry practices with latest technology to effectively reach and disciple people.
related_products.features: For pastors who want to use today's tech but don't have IT pros on staff. We cover all the basics (membership, communication, groups, giving) and advanced (check-in, volunteers, registration, workflow automation) features you need to keep all your people data in one place. Online giving is beautiful at the lowest price in the industry. Text-to-Church makes giving, registration, check-in, digital connection cards, links to anywhere, access to my stuff with a text. Now with 2 way text to chat!

similar_products.short_desc: Complete church management system. See why so many churches are making the switch (nearly 10,000 in just the last two years)!
similar_products.features: We exist to help churches thrive! Powerful, easy to use church management for attendance, contributions, groups, pledging, donor statements, mass email/text, child check-in, mail merge, sacraments, dashboards, robust custom reporting and much more! PC/MAC/iOS/Android. Over 35K churches and 150K ministry leaders moved to Servant Keeper 8(nearly 10,000 churches in just the last two years)! Find out why they are making the switch!

similar_products.short_desc: Subsplash is the only digital ecosystem that combines everything you need to manage and engage your community.
similar_products.features: Subsplash is more than just a ChMS. It's the only digital ecosystem that combines everything you need to manage and engage your community, including apps, digital giving, web tools, websites, podcasting, live streaming, group communication, and much more.

similar_products.short_desc: Aplos lets your church track designated funds, generate reports, accept online giving, and automatically generate giving statements.
similar_products.features: Aplos provides intuitive church management software that lets you track designated funds, run reports, communicate with your congregation, accept online giving, and generate giving statements by member or household. You can also use Text to Give to accept tithes and offerings.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy-to-use church management software to quickly organize people, groups, events, contributions, & more. Start a free 30-day trial!
similar_products.features: Our mission is to provide churches the most easy-to-use ChMS available, at an affordable price. With Breeze, your church can store an unlimited number of people in your database, securely check in children & print name tags, send email & text messages, offer online & text giving, run extensive reporting and much more. Best of all, there's no contract, no setup fees, and we'll even move in your existing data at no cost! Try Breeze free for 30 days and see why more than 9,000 churches love Breeze.

similar_products.short_desc: Total solution for maintaining complete and up-to-date census, accounting, and giving information for Catholic parishes and dioceses.
similar_products.features:
ParishSOFT offers software products which allow Catholic parishes and dioceses gain access to the most reliable, up-to-date records to manage their church effectively. 

Church Management software that fully integrates with our online giving solution that complements your weekly envelope giving. It also includes our MinistryOne app at no additional charge!  

No more Quickbooks! Now you have a solution designed for the Catholic community.

similar_products.short_desc: Church management software to help you build relationships and streamline giving so you can spend more time focusing on what matters.
similar_products.features: Storehouse is a church database that helps you engage with your community and manage your data with ease. It is the only church software on the market that includes a fully automated communication system, allowing you to send text/email messages right from your dashboard. Storehouse is packed with features that help you easily manage people, small groups and their attendance details, keep track of check-ins by parents at kids ministries and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Pushpay is a leading technology company that delivers digital solutions to help churches achieve their missions.
similar_products.features: Pushpay is a leading technology company that delivers digital solutions to help churches achieve their missions. Our leading ChurchStaq, ParishStaq, and Resi Media suites simplify engagement, giving, administration, and video streaming-enabling our more than 14,500 customers to increase generosity, drive participation, and build stronger relationships with their communities.

similar_products.short_desc:
Easy Affordable church management software with everything you need for only $33.33/month. 

Try it Free for 10 Days!
similar_products.features:
Faith Teams is the Easy and Affordable church management software for small and mid-sized churches.  

Our web-based software is the all-in-one solution, including all the features you need for only $33.33/month flat rate.  Our team will help move you in, and provide whatever you need to get started fast. 

Try the entire system FREE for 10 Days!

similar_products.short_desc: Engage donors, plan events, manage members, track volunteers, and more with the best all-in-one software for faith-based organizations.
similar_products.features: Neon CRM is a cloud-based nonprofit software suite that provides tools built to support the good work faith-based organizations do. Regardless of size or industry, our CRM helps thousands of organizations and associations engage with donors, manage memberships, plan events, track volunteers, and much more -- your whole operation out of one single, unified software.

similar_products.short_desc: Designed from the ground up to increase first time givers. Users can round-up everyday transactions to donate to your charity.
similar_products.features: Gyve isn't just another payment processing app. We are a generosity system built on one simple concept; everyone in your organization is at a different place in their generosity journey.  We want to help you encourage each person to take their next steps in giving.  Gyve is the first and only platform offering mobile, online, text-to-give, and round-up donation options.  The most powerful communication tool in the industry, lets organizations target message groups to maximize donor development.

similar_products.short_desc: User-friendly, powerful church management software with Membership, Scheduler, Donations, Accounting, and Payroll. Desktop and Web!
similar_products.features: Church Windows is powerful and flexible yet user-friendly church management software from a well-established leader in the industry. Choose complete integrated packages of Membership, Scheduler, Donations, Accounting and Payroll modules, or begin with one portion and add additional modules later. In addition to the experienced toll-free & online support, we offer free online training classes. Find out why more than 13,000 churches since 1987 see things clearly through Church Windows Software.

similar_products.short_desc: Increase tithes and offerings with the number 1 online giving and church management system! Rates as low as .5% + .30 a transaction!
similar_products.features: Churches are switching to Continue To Give because our system Increases Giving, and saves you time and money! Our top-rated giving system lets people give when they want, and how they want through options like WEBSITE, TEXT, APP, KIOSK, and more. Don't settle for less. Our complete church management system also makes the back office simple and streamlined.  We have you covered with everything you need like emails, texting, child checking, event tickets, fund accounting, and more.  Signup today!

similar_products.short_desc: Complete Church Management Solution -  Completely organize all of your church information - small groups, members, contributions & more
similar_products.features:
Complete Church Management Solution - 
INSTALLED or CLOUD - your choice!

Installed = No Monthly Fees.
Cloud = Access anywhere.

Get your church completely organized, with our POWERFUL yet EASY TO USE church management solution -  Members, Visitors, Groups, Teams, Giving, Email/Texting, Check-In, Classes, Spiritual Gifts, and more.

Excellerate has been helping thousands of churches for over 20 years.  Try it Free!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Church Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Church Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Church Accounting software provides ministries specialized tools for church bookkeeping. It can be used for fund accounting, donation tracking, and payroll management. Churches often use accounting software to manage expenses and provide accurate financial reporting for their congregations. Church Accounting software is closely related to Accounting software, and Nonprofit software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Donation Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Donation Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Donation Management software helps nonprofit organizations collect, track, and distribute funds contributed by their patrons, maintain donors' information, and connect with them during fundraising campaigns. Payment processing capabilities as well as contact management features are essential parts of this software. For related software solutions see Fundraising software, Grant Management software and Payment Processing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Membership Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Membership Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Membership Management software automates the management of membership within associations, communities ,and other member-based organizations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform group members as well as administration and business process tools for organizations. A variety of membership-oriented groups use these software applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, and collect fees as well as to recruit and retain members. Membership Management software is related to Association Management software, Church Management software and Club Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Nonprofit software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Nonprofit tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Nonprofit software automates all aspects of nonprofit operations from database management, to fundraising, to accounting and CRM. Nonprofit software is related to Donation Management software and Nonprofit Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Worship software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Worship tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Worship software makes planning and running religious meetings easy by automating preparation and coordination efforts of pastors, choirs, music bands, and the congregation.

pricing_plans.description: Available at $415.00 in physical media format for a new user. Software is licensed to the chruch not individual user.
